alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact areas from near Kingstree, SC to just southwest of Whiteville through 415 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm from Galivants Ferry to just north of Kingstree, moving northeast at 30 mph. These thunderstorms will move into southern Columbus County after 4 PM. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Mullins, Kingstree, Horry, Tabor City, Loris, Chadbourn, Bethel, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Fair Bluff, Hemingway, Cades, Nesmith, Rains, Southeastern Community College, Morrisville, Galivants Ferry, Sidney and Clarendon. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
